about_the_game:
This DLC package contains the Original Soundtrack for Wheel Riders Online. 10 unique tracks with a running length of 50 minutes and 52 seconds. All tracks are included in FLAC (lossless), MP3 (at 320 kbps) & WAV (wave) formats.

Tracklist:
- Atmos Deal (4:18)
- Craft Back (4:56)
- Final Fight (5:40)
- Insight Sign (4:07)
- Knight of the Road (4:14)
- Menu Theme (5:18)
- Neuro Crash (5:13)
- Post Rock Theme (4:56)
- Road King (4:51)
- Rock Wheel (5:24)

name: Wheel Riders Online - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo, 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2, 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GTS / AMD Radeon 3850
  • Storage: 75 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 750, 2.67 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6950
  • Storage: 75 MB available space

short_description: This DLC package contains the Original Soundtrack for Wheel Riders Online.
